titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to carry out a land exchange involving lands in Inyo and San Bernardino Counties, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 9/26/2000--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to exchange specified Federal lands in Inyo and San Bernardino Counties, California, for certain non-Federal lands in Inyo County.
